ygData.subject: RE: Trade of the Century..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Any idea which is worse, Mynthi or the negotiator?  The negotiator managed to charm me at level 36 while I was playing one magic resist song (93 resist).
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 14 Oct 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> aw damn you saw that? =)
> yah i tried to get Mynthi Davissi but she charmed me before i got my magic
> resistance song going and to make a long stroy short... i was the naked
> invisible wood elf hehe.

Any idea which is worse, Mynthi or the negotiator? The
negotiator managed to charm me at level 36 while I was playing
one magic resist song (93 resist). Fortunately, due to bard
hatred, she only ended up charming the two bards in the party,
and thus our party only had to put up with two extra attackers
punching for 1-8 points damage.

The next time we took her on, I had both songs going, plus a
magic resist buff. At 185 magic resist, I didn't get charmed.
:-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
